subject: Cemetery Files
author: kolrone
full_text:
I went to a local cemetery last Friday with my friend , loaded up with
the normal gear and I brought my hacked 12-469. We were only able to
use it for a couple of minutes before the batteries died, but I did
find a couple of files. One I heard on the radio, the second I don't
know if it was an EVP or if it came from the radio.
http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Aaron%27s%20Files/12-469%20New%20Model/

The Files are named 8-1-2008 Ghost Box EVP 1.mp3 and 8-1-2008 Ghost
Box EVP 2.mp3

-Aaron
